text:
I am currently a Research Assistant applying data science and machine learning to process and analyze magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of pediatric brains at the Computational Imaging of Brain Organization Research Group at Children’s Hospital Los Angeles.
I graduated in the Neuroimaging and Informatics Master’s Program at the University of Southern California (USC) and I strive to contribute to advancing our understanding of the human brain through data science and biomedical imaging.

I am currently a Research Assistant applying data science and machine learning to process and analyze magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of pediatric brains at the Computational Imaging of Brain Organization Research Group at Children’s Hospital Los Angeles.
I graduated in the Neuroimaging and Informatics Master’s Program at the University of Southern California (USC) and I strive to contribute to advancing our understanding of the human brain through data science and biomedical imaging.

Jun 2025 - Present Children’s Hospital Los Angeles, Los Angeles CA  Research Assistant, Computational Imaging of Brain Organization Research Group 

Magnetic Resonance (MR) image processing of infant brains (ages 0-18).
MRI brain data preprocessing, visualization, and analysis.
Contribution to the development of a novel automated method for segmentation of pediatric brain structures.
Data management.








Jun 2025 - Present USC Mark & Mary Stevens Neuroimaging and Informatics Institute, Los Angeles CA  Resource Employee, Laboratory of NeuroImaging 

Performing end-to-end server administration.
Deploying XNAT instance on Linux server to manage neuroimaging research projects.








Oct 2022 - Jul 2024 Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston MA  Programmer, Center for Addiction Medicine 

Data pipeline design, implementation, and optimization for large-scale clinical trial data.
Shiny app and dashboard development - automation of data processing, visualization, and monitoring
Dataset harmonization (JSON and CSV) for exploratory and primary analysis.
Collaborated with Biostatistician to implement the statistical analysis plan using Linear Regression.
Report design - annual epidemiological report automatically generated with Markdown.








Bar-Ilan University, Tel-Aviv - Israel Aug 2020 - Dec 2020  Research Intern, Developmental Neuropsychology Lab 

Data processing, cleaning, and analysis for eye-tracking data to measure EEG and gaze coordination patterns using repeated measures ANOVA.

Jun 2025 - Present Children’s Hospital Los Angeles, Los Angeles CA  Research Assistant, Computational Imaging of Brain Organization Research Group 

Magnetic Resonance (MR) image processing of infant brains (ages 0-18).

Contribution to the development of a novel automated method for segmentation of pediatric brain structures.
Data management.

I am a graduate student in the Neuroimaging and Informatics Master’s Program at the University of Southern California (USC). My research interests involve applying data science and machine learning to process biomedical signals, with a focus in magnetic resonance images of the brain.
